question: Which technology major’s investment of 7.73% stake in Jio Platforms has been approved by the Competition Commission of India?
explanation:
The Competition Commission of India (CCI) has recently approved Google's proposed purchase of 7.73 % stake in Jio Platforms.
Earlier in the month of July 2020, Google announced its plans to invest 7.73% stake in Reliance’s technology arm – Jio Platforms for an amount of Rs,33,737 crore.
